summary_validation.statement: Provides the highest limits among FWD tiers for core coverages: Medical (SGD 1M), Trip Cancellation (SGD 15k), Baggage (SGD 7.5k), Personal Liability (SGD 1M).
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF confirms these limits for the 'First' tier: Medical Expenses Overseas S$1,000,000 (Page 7), Trip Cancellation S$15,000 (Page 5), Theft/Damage Baggage S$7,500 (Page 6), Personal Liability S$1,000,000 (Page 7). These are the highest limits shown in the tables compared to Premium and Business tiers.
summary_validation.pdf_location: Pages 5, 6, 7 (Quick summary of your benefits tables)

summary_validation.explanation: The PDF confirms 'Unlimited' coverage for 'Emergency medical evacuation & repatriation' under the 'First' tier.
summary_validation.pdf_location: Page 7 (Quick summary of your benefits table), Page 17 (Emergency medical evacuation & repatriation section)

summary_validation.statement: Covers core requirements (Medical, Cancellation, Delay, Baggage) comprehensively.
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF details coverage for Medical Expenses (Pages 7, 19-21), Trip Cancellation (Pages 5, 10-11), Travel Delay (Pages 5, 12-13), and Baggage Delay/Theft/Damage (Pages 6, 14-15) under the First tier, with the highest limits offered by FWD.

summary_validation.statement: Covers participation in recreational golf and hiking.
summary_validation.explanation: The policy covers medical expenses (Page 19) and personal accident (Page 18) for injuries sustained during the trip. General exclusions (Page 31) exclude professional sports but not recreational participation. High altitude hiking (above 3000m) is excluded (Page 32), but standard recreational hiking is implicitly covered.

summary_validation.statement: Includes Car Rental Excess cover (SGD 1k limit).
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF confirms 'Car rental excess' cover is 'Included in base cover' for the First tier with a limit of S$1,000.
summary_validation.pdf_location: Page 6 (Quick summary of your benefits table), Page 9 (Optional Covers table note), Page 28 (Car rental excess section)

summary_validation.statement: Does not cover reimbursement for unused green fees.
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF does not mention any specific benefit covering unused green fees due to illness or other reasons. Trip cancellation/cut short covers pre-paid travel/accommodation/tours (Page 11), but green fees are not explicitly listed.

summary_validation.statement: Does not cover liability for damage to a rented golf buggy.
summary_validation.explanation: Personal Liability (Page 17) explicitly excludes liability arising from the use of 'motorised vehicles'. Car Rental Excess (Page 28) applies to rental cars from licensed operators for road use and does not mention golf buggies.
summary_validation.pdf_location: Page 17 (Personal liability while on your trip - What is not covered), Page 28 (Car rental excess)

summary_validation.statement: Does not offer a hole-in-one benefit.
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF does not mention any specific benefit related to achieving a hole-in-one during golf.

summary_validation.statement: Requires purchase of an optional 'Sports equipment protector' add-on for golf equipment coverage, which has a SGD 2,000 limit and excludes damage occurring during play.
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF confirms 'Sports equipment protector' is an optional cover (Page 9) with a S$2,000 limit for the First tier. Page 28 defines covered equipment including golf clubs. Page 29 explicitly excludes 'damage that happens while your sports equipment is in use, whether for practice or play'.
summary_validation.pdf_location: Page 9 (Optional Covers), Pages 28-29 (Sports equipment protector details)

overall_assessment.explanation: The comparison report section accurately reflects the coverage, limits, conditions, and exclusions for the FWD 'First' tier as detailed in the provided policy document. All analysed requirements and summary statements were found to be factually supported by the PDF, including the identification of required optional add-ons and specific exclusions relevant to the customer's needs.
